verses.text: Behold, the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*, and thy \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* shall be \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thee.

For I will \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* against \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*; and the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall be \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*, and the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w rifled|strong="H8155"\w*, and the \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w ravished|strong="H7901"\w*; and \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* into \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w*, and the \w residue|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall not be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

Then shall the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against those \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, as \w when|strong="H3117"\w* he \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w battle|strong="H7128"\w*.

¶ And his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* upon the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Olives|strong="H2132"\w*, which \add is\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* on the \w east|strong="H6924"\w*, and the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Olives|strong="H2132"\w* shall \w cleave|strong="H1234"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H2677"\w* thereof toward the \w east|strong="H4217"\w* and toward the \w west|strong="H3220"\w*, \add and there shall be\add* a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w valley|strong="H1516"\w*; and \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* shall \w remove|strong="H4185"\w* toward the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, and \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of it toward the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*.

And ye shall \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* \add to\add* the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*; for the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* shall \w reach|strong="H5060"\w* unto \w Azal|strong="H0682"\w*: yea, ye shall \w flee|strong="H5127"\w*, like as ye \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w earthquake|strong="H7494"\w* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*: and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \add and\add* all the \w saints|strong="H6918"\w* with thee.\f + \fr 14.5 \ft the mountains: or, my mountains\f*\f + \fr 14.5 \ft for the…: or, when he shall touch the valley of the mountains to the place he separated\f*

And it shall come to pass in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add that\add* the \w light|strong="H0216"\w* shall not be \w clear|strong="H3368"\w*, \add nor\add* \w dark|strong="H7087"\w*:\f + \fr 14.6 \ft that the…: that is, it shall not be clear in some places, and dark in other places of the world\f*\f + \fr 14.6 \ft clear: Heb. precious\f*\f + \fr 14.6 \ft dark: Heb. thickness\f*

But it shall be \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* which shall be \w known|strong="H3045"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, not \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, nor \w night|strong="H3915"\w*: but it shall come to pass, \add that\add* at \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* it shall be \w light|strong="H0216"\w*.\f + \fr 14.7 \ft it shall be…: or, the day shall be one\f*

And it shall be in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add that\add* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* shall go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of them toward the \w former|strong="H6931"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of them toward the \w hinder|strong="H0314"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*: in \w summer|strong="H7019"\w* and in \w winter|strong="H2779"\w* shall it be.\f + \fr 14.8 \ft former: or, eastern\f*

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall be \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall there be \w one|strong="H0259"\w* 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w*.

All the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* as a \w plain|strong="H6160"\w* from \w Geba|strong="H1387"\w* to \w Rimmon|strong="H7417"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: and it shall be lifted \w up|strong="H7213"\w*, and \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w* in her place, from \w Benjamin’s|strong="H1144"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* unto the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, unto the \w corner|strong="H6434"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and \add from\add* the \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* of \w Hananeel|strong="H2606"\w* unto the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w winepresses|strong="H3342"\w*.\f + \fr 14.10 \ft turned: or, compassed\f*\f + \fr 14.10 \ft inhabited: or, shall abide\f*

And \add men\add* shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in it, and there shall be no more utter \w destruction|strong="H2764"\w*; but \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* shall be \w safely|strong="H0983"\w* \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w*.\f + \fr 14.11 \ft shall be: or, shall abide\f*

¶ And this shall be the \w plague|strong="H4046"\w* wherewith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w smite|strong="H5062"\w* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that have \w fought|strong="H6633"\w* against \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; Their \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* shall consume \w away|strong="H4743"\w* while they \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* upon their \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* shall consume \w away|strong="H4743"\w* in their \w holes|strong="H2356"\w*, and their \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* shall consume \w away|strong="H4743"\w* in their \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

And it shall come to pass in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add that\add* a \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w tumult|strong="H4103"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall be among them; and they shall lay \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* on the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, and his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* shall rise \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*.

And \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* also shall \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; and the \w wealth|strong="H2428"\w* of all the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* shall be gathered \w together|strong="H0622"\w*, \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w apparel|strong="H0899"\w*, in \w great|strong="H3966"\w* \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*.\f + \fr 14.14 \ft Judah…: or, thou also, O Judah shalt\f*\f + \fr 14.14 \ft at: or, against\f*

And so shall be the \w plague|strong="H4046"\w* of the \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*, of the \w mule|strong="H6505"\w*, of the \w camel|strong="H1581"\w*, and of the \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, and of all the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* that shall be in \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w tents|strong="H4264"\w*, as this \w plague|strong="H4046"\w*.

¶ And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* every one that is \w left|strong="H3498"\w* of all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* which \w came|strong="H0935"\w* against \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* shall even go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H1767"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* to \w year|strong="H8141"\w* to \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* the \w King|strong="H4428"\w*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, and to \w keep|strong="H2287"\w* the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of \w tabernacles|strong="H5521"\w*.

And it shall be, \add that\add* whoso will not come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* of \add all\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* unto \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* to \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* the \w King|strong="H4428"\w*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, even upon them shall be no \w rain|strong="H1653"\w*.

And if the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* go not \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w come|strong="H0935"\w* not, that \add have\add* no \add rain;\add* there shall be the \w plague|strong="H4046"\w*, wherewith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w smite|strong="H5062"\w* the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* that come not \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w keep|strong="H2287"\w* the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of \w tabernacles|strong="H5521"\w*.\f + \fr 14.18 \ft that have no: Heb. upon whom there is not\f*

This shall be the \w punishment|strong="H2403"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and the \w punishment|strong="H2403"\w* of all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* that come not \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w keep|strong="H2287"\w* the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of \w tabernacles|strong="H5521"\w*.\f + \fr 14.19 \ft punishment: or, sin\f*

¶ In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall there be upon the \w bells|strong="H4698"\w* of the \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \w HOLINESS|strong="H6944"\w* UNTO THE 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and the \w pots|strong="H5518"\w* in the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* shall be like the \w bowls|strong="H4219"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.  +  r 14.20  t bells: or, bridles *

Yea, every \w pot|strong="H5518"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* and in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* shall be \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: and all they that \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of them, and \w seethe|strong="H1310"\w* therein: and in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* there shall be no more the \w Canaanite|strong="H3669"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.
